description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的一院制国会，存在于1792年9月21日至1795年10月26日，掌握立法与行政权力，并宣告了法兰西第一共和国的成立。
description.en: The unicameral assembly during the French Revolution, existing from September 21, 1792, to October 26, 1795. It held both legislative and executive powers and proclaimed the French First Republic.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命中的一次起义，导致法国君主制被推翻，并直接促成了国民公会的召开。
description.en: An insurrection during the French Revolution that led to the overthrow of the French monarchy and directly prompted the convening of the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的立法机关，是国民公会的前身。八月十日事件后，该议会颁布法令召开了国民公会。
description.en: The legislature of France during the French Revolution, preceding the National Convention. After the Insurrection of 10 August 1792, this assembly decreed the convening of the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 法国波旁王朝国王。在八月十日事件后被国民立法议会暂停职务，后被国民公会审判并处决。
description.en: King of France from the House of Bourbon. He was suspended from his duties by the Legislative Assembly after the Insurrection of 10 August 1792, and later tried and executed by the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 于1792年9月22日由国民公会宣告成立的共和国政体，取代了法兰西王国。
description.en: The republic proclaimed by the National Convention on September 22, 1792, which replaced the Kingdom of France.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国督政府时期的立法机构上议院，继承了国民公会的部分立法权力。
description.en: The upper house of the legislature during the French Directory period of the French First Republic, which inherited part of the legislative power of the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 法兰西第一共和国督政府时期的立法机构下议院，继承了国民公会的部分立法权力。
description.en: The lower house of the legislature during the French Directory period of the French First Republic, which inherited part of the legislative power of the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 在国民公会解散后成立的行政机构，掌握法兰西第一共和国的行政权力。
description.en: The executive body established after the dissolution of the National Convention, which held the executive power of the French First Republic.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期国民公会内的右翼政治派别，与山岳派对立，后在1793年6月2日的暴动中被清除出国民公会。
description.en: A right-wing political faction within the National Convention during the French Revolution, opposed to the Montagnards, and purged from the Convention in the insurrection of June 2, 1793.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期国民公会内的激进左翼政治派别，与吉伦特派对立，在清除吉伦特派后主导国民公会并发动了雅各宾专政。
description.en: A radical left-wing political faction within the National Convention during the French Revolution, opposed to the Girondins. After purging the Girondins, they dominated the Convention and initiated the Reign of Terror.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期国民公会内人数最多的中间派别。
description.en: The largest centrist faction within the National Convention during the French Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 法国国王路易十六在革命广场被国民公会下令以断头台处决的事件。
description.en: The event where King Louis XVI of France was executed by guillotine in the Place de la Révolution by order of the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命期间巴黎的激进平民，是山岳派的政治盟友，对革命进程施加了重要影响。
description.en: The radical common people of Paris during the French Revolution, who were political allies of the Montagnards and exerted significant influence on the course of the revolution.

description.zh-cn: 由巴黎公社和无套裤汉发动的武装暴动，导致吉伦特派领袖被从国民公会中驱逐，山岳派开始掌权。
description.en: An armed insurrection initiated by the Paris Commune and the sans-culottes, which led to the purge of Girondin leaders from the National Convention and the rise to power of the Montagnards.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命期间巴黎的市政府，在推动革命激进化过程中扮演了重要角色，包括策划了1793年5月31日至6月2日的暴动。
description.en: The government of Paris during the French Revolution, which played a key role in the radicalization of the revolution, including organizing the insurrection of 31 May – 2 June 1793.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的女性，因同情吉伦特派而刺杀了山岳派领袖让-保尔·马拉。
description.en: A figure of the French Revolution who, out of sympathy for the Girondins, assassinated the Montagnard leader Jean-Paul Marat.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的雅各宾派领袖和记者，被视为无套裤汉的偶像，后被夏绿蒂·科黛刺杀。
description.en: A Jacobin leader and journalist during the French Revolution, considered an idol of the sans-culottes, who was later assassinated by Charlotte Corday.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命期间由山岳派主导的专制统治时期，以救国委员会和治安委员会为核心，通过革命法庭等机构对“革命的敌人”进行大规模镇压和处决。
description.en: A period of despotic rule led by the Montagnards during the French Revolution, centered around the Committee of Public Safety and the Committee of General Security, which conducted mass suppression and executions of 'enemies of the revolution' through institutions like the Revolutionary Tribunal.

description.zh-cn: 由山岳派主导的国民公会批准的民主宪法，但因战争而被推迟实施，从未生效。
description.en: A democratic constitution ratified by the Montagnard-dominated National Convention, but its implementation was postponed due to war and it never came into effect.

description.zh-cn: 由国民公会设立的委员会，在雅各宾专政时期成为实际的行政机关，掌握巨大权力。
description.en: A committee created by the National Convention that became the de facto executive government during the Reign of Terror, wielding immense power.

description.zh-cn: 由国民公会设立的委员会，负责警察和司法监视职能，是雅各宾专政的重要机构。
description.en: A committee established by the National Convention responsible for police and judicial surveillance functions, and a key institution of the Reign of Terror.

nodes.id: 马克西米连·罗伯斯庇尔

zh-cn: 马克西米连·罗伯斯庇尔

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期山岳派及雅各宾派的领袖，救国委员会的核心成员，雅各宾专政的主要推动者，最终在热月政变中被推翻并处决。
description.en: A leader of the Montagnards and Jacobins during the French Revolution, a key member of the Committee of Public Safety, and the main driver of the Reign of Terror. He was ultimately overthrown and executed in the Thermidorian Reaction.

nodes.id: 安东万·路易·德·圣茹斯特

zh-cn: 安东万·路易·德·圣茹斯特

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的山岳派领袖，救国委员会成员，罗伯斯庇尔的亲密盟友，在热月政变后一同被处决。
description.en: A Montagnard leader during the French Revolution, member of the Committee of Public Safety, and a close ally of Robespierre. He was executed alongside him after the Thermidorian Reaction.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的极左派系，主张极端激进政策，后被救国委员会镇压并处决其领袖。
description.en: A far-left faction during the French Revolution that advocated for extremely radical policies. It was later suppressed by the Committee of Public Safety, and its leaders were executed.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期山岳派的创始领袖之一，后成为温和派（丹东派）的代表人物，被救国委员会视为威胁而处决。
description.en: One of the founding leaders of the Montagnards during the French Revolution, who later became the representative figure of the moderate faction (Dantonists). He was executed by the Committee of Public Safety as a threat.

description.zh-cn: 法国大革命时期的记者和政治家，丹东派的核心成员，与丹东一同被救国委员会处决。
description.en: A journalist and politician during the French Revolution, a core member of the Dantonists, who was executed along with Danton by the Committee of Public Safety.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会内部发动的政变，推翻了罗伯斯庇尔及其政治盟友的统治，结束了雅各宾专政。
description.en: A coup d'état within the National Convention that overthrew the rule of Robespierre and his political allies, ending the Reign of Terror.

description.zh-cn: 在热月政变后由国民公会制定并通过的宪法，该宪法建立了督政府体制。
description.en: The constitution drafted and passed by the National Convention after the Thermidorian Reaction, which established the Directory regime.

description.zh-cn: 由拿破仑·波拿巴指挥的军队镇压巴黎保皇党人叛乱的事件，巩固了热月党人的统治并确保了向督政府的平稳过渡。
description.en: An event where troops commanded by Napoleon Bonaparte suppressed a royalist rebellion in Paris, consolidating the rule of the Thermidorians and ensuring a smooth transition to the Directory.

description.zh-cn: 法国军事家、政治家。在葡月13日事件中受国民公会任命镇压叛乱，为其政治生涯的崛起奠定了基础。
description.en: French military and political leader. He was appointed by the National Convention to suppress the rebellion of 13 Vendémiaire, laying the foundation for his political rise.

description.zh-cn: 法国的工程师大学校，由国民公会于1794年创办。
description.en: A French grande école of engineering, founded in 1794 by the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 法国的精英高等教育机构，由国民公会于1794年创办。
description.en: An elite higher education institution in France, founded in 1794 by the National Convention.

nodes.id: 法国国立东方语言文化学院

zh-cn: 法国国立东方语言文化学院
en: Institut national des langues et civilisations orientales

description.zh-cn: 法国专门研究世界语言和文化的大学校，由国民公会于1795年创办。
description.en: A French grande école specializing in world languages and cultures, founded in 1795 by the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 指巴黎国立高等音乐舞蹈学院的前身，由国民公会于1795年创办。
description.en: Refers to the predecessor of the Conservatoire de Paris, founded in 1795 by the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 八月十日事件推翻了君主制，国民立法议会因此颁布法令，召开国民公会以起草新宪法。
description.en: The Insurrection of 10 August 1792 overthrew the monarchy, leading the Legislative Assembly to decree the convening of the National Convention to draft a new constitution.

description.zh-cn: 八月十日事件后，国民立法议会颁布法令召开了作为其继承者的国民公会。
description.en: After the Insurrection of 10 August 1792, the Legislative Assembly decreed the convening of the National Convention as its successor.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会于1792年9月21日通过决议废除君主制，并于次日宣告法兰西第一共和国成立。
description.en: The National Convention passed a resolution to abolish the monarchy on September 21, 1792, and proclaimed the French First Republic the following day.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会审判了路易十六，并投票决定将其处决。
description.en: The National Convention tried Louis XVI and voted for his execution.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会下令于1793年1月21日处决路易十六。
description.en: The National Convention ordered the execution of Louis XVI on January 21, 1793.

description.zh-cn: 山岳派是国民公会中的激进左翼派别。
description.en: The Montagnards were the radical left-wing faction within the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 吉伦特派是国民公会中的右翼派别。
description.en: The Girondins were the right-wing faction within the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 平原派是国民公会中的中间派别。
description.en: The Plain was the centrist faction within the National Convention.

description.zh-cn: 山岳派与吉伦特派在国民公会中是激烈的政治对手，冲突不断，最终山岳派通过武装暴动清除了吉伦特派。
description.en: The Montagnards and Girondins were fierce political rivals in the National Convention, with constant conflict, which culminated in the Montagnards purging the Girondins through an armed insurrection.

description.zh-cn: 无套裤汉是山岳派的紧密政治盟友，为其提供了来自巴黎基层的群众支持。
description.en: The sans-culottes were close political allies of the Montagnards, providing them with popular support from the common people of Paris.

description.zh-cn: 这次暴动导致29名吉伦特派领袖被逮捕，吉伦特派的政治力量就此终结。
description.en: This insurrection led to the arrest of 29 Girondin leaders, terminating the political power of the Girondins.

description.zh-cn: 约8万名武装的无套裤汉包围了国民公会，迫使其逮捕吉伦特派领袖。
description.en: Approximately 80,000 armed sans-culottes surrounded the National Convention, forcing it to arrest the Girondin leaders.

description.zh-cn: 巴黎公社呼吁并组织各区力量，成立了叛乱起义委员会，策划并发动了此次暴动。
description.en: The Paris Commune called for and organized forces from the sections, formed an insurrectionary committee, and planned and launched this insurrection.

description.zh-cn: 夏绿蒂·科黛于1793年7月13日谋杀了让-保尔·马拉。
description.en: Charlotte Corday assassinated Jean-Paul Marat on July 13, 1793.

description.zh-cn: 在清除了吉伦特派后，山岳派主导的国民公会建立了一系列机构和法令，开启了雅各宾专政（或称恐怖统治）。
description.en: After purging the Girondins, the Montagnard-dominated National Convention established a series of institutions and decrees, initiating the Reign of Terror.

description.zh-cn: 救国委员会是国民公会设立的下属委员会，名义上向公会负责，但在雅各宾专政时期实际掌控了行政权力。
description.en: The Committee of Public Safety was a subordinate committee established by the National Convention and was nominally responsible to it, but it effectively controlled executive power during the Reign of Terror.

description.zh-cn: 治安委员会是国民公会设立的下属委员会，负责警察和监视职能。
description.en: The Committee of General Security was a subordinate committee established by the National Convention, responsible for police and surveillance functions.

relationships.source: 马克西米连·罗伯斯庇尔

description.zh-cn: 马克西米连·罗伯斯庇尔于1793年7月27日加入救国委员会，并成为其核心领导人物。
description.en: Maximilien Robespierre joined the Committee of Public Safety on July 27, 1793, and became its central leading figure.

relationships.source: 安东万·路易·德·圣茹斯特

description.zh-cn: 安东万·路易·德·圣茹斯特于1793年7月加入救国委员会，是罗伯斯庇尔的亲密盟友。
description.en: Louis Antoine de Saint-Just joined the Committee of Public Safety in July 1793 and was a close ally of Robespierre.

description.zh-cn: 救国委员会决定清除极左的埃贝尔派，并于1794年3月24日将其主要成员处决。
description.en: The Committee of Public Safety decided to purge the far-left Hébertists and executed their main members on March 24, 1794.

description.zh-cn: 在清除了埃贝尔派后，救国委员会转向打击以丹东为首的右翼（温和派），并于1794年4月5日将其处决。
description.en: After purging the Hébertists, the Committee of Public Safety turned against the right-wing (moderate) faction led by Danton and executed him on April 5, 1794.

description.zh-cn: 作为丹东派的核心成员，卡米尔·德穆兰与丹东一同于1794年4月5日被救国委员会处决。
description.en: As a core member of the Dantonists, Camille Desmoulins was executed along with Danton by the Committee of Public Safety on April 5, 1794.

relationships.target: 马克西米连·罗伯斯庇尔

description.zh-cn: 热月政变推翻了罗伯斯庇尔的统治，他于政变次日（热月10日）被处决。
description.en: The Thermidorian Reaction overthrew the rule of Robespierre, and he was executed the day after the coup (10 Thermidor).

description.zh-cn: 热月政变的成功标志着雅各宾专政（恐怖统治）的结束。
description.en: The success of the Thermidorian Reaction marked the end of the Reign of Terror.

description.zh-cn: 热月政变后，国民公会制定并通过了共和三年宪法，建立了督政府体制。
description.en: After the Thermidorian Reaction, the National Convention drafted and passed the Constitution of the Year III, which established the Directory regime.

description.zh-cn: 拿破仑·波拿巴受国民公会任命，指挥军队成功镇压了保皇党人的叛乱。
description.en: Appointed by the National Convention, Napoleon Bonaparte commanded the army and successfully suppressed the royalist rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会于1795年10月26日解散，其行政权力由新成立的督政府继承。
description.en: The National Convention was dissolved on October 26, 1795, and its executive power was inherited by the newly formed Directory.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会于1795年10月26日解散，其立法权力由元老院和五百人院继承。
description.en: The National Convention was dissolved on October 26, 1795, and its legislative power was inherited by the Council of Ancients and the Council of Five Hundred.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会于1795年10月26日解散，其立法权力由元老院和五百人院继承。
description.en: The National Convention was dissolved on October 26, 1795, and its legislative power was inherited by the Council of Ancients and the Council of Five Hundred.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会于1794年创办了巴黎综合理工学院，作为其建立公共教育系统的一部分。
description.en: The National Convention founded the École Polytechnique in 1794 as part of its efforts to establish a public education system.

description.zh-cn: 国民公会于1794年创办了巴黎高等师范学校。
description.en: The National Convention founded the École normale supérieure in 1794.
